### executable startup code 


* Linux: executables don't start at <code>main</code>
* why not? 

   * need to initialize <code>printf</code>, <code>cout</code>, <code>malloc</code>, etc. data structures
   * <code>main</code> needs to return somewhere

* compiler links in startup code
